verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah, <S%H7141><s%> A Song <S%H7892><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> Alamoth. <S%H5961><s%> God <S%H430><s%> is our refuge <S%H4268><s%> and strength, <S%H5797><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> present <S%H4672><s%> help <S%H5833><s%> in trouble. <S%H6869><s%>

Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> will not <S%H3808><s%> we fear, <S%H3372><s%> though the earth <S%H776><s%> be removed, <S%H4171><s%> and though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> be carried <S%H4131><s%> into the midst <S%H3820><s%> of the sea; <S%H3220><s%>

Though the waters <S%H4325><s%> thereof roar <S%H1993><s%> and be troubled, <S%H2560><s%> though the mountains <S%H2022><s%> shake <S%H7493><s%> with the swelling <S%H1346><s%> thereof. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

There is a river, <S%H5104><s%> the streams <S%H6388><s%> whereof shall make glad <S%H8055><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> the holy <S%H6918><s%> place of the tabernacles <S%H4908><s%> of the most High. <S%H5945><s%>

God <S%H430><s%> is in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her; she shall not <S%H1077><s%> be moved: <S%H4131><s%> God <S%H430><s%> shall help <S%H5826><s%> her, and that right <S%H6437><s%> early. <S%H1242><s%>
The heathen <S%H1471><s%> raged, <S%H1993><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> were moved: <S%H4131><s%> he uttered <S%H5414><s%> his voice, <S%H6963><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> melted. <S%H4127><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> us; the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge. <S%H4869><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Come, <S%H1980><s%> behold <S%H2372><s%> the works <S%H4659><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H834><s%> desolations <S%H8047><s%> he hath made <S%H7760><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>

He maketh wars <S%H4421><s%> to cease <S%H7673><s%> unto <S%H5704><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> he breaketh <S%H7665><s%> the bow, <S%H7198><s%> and cutteth <S%H7112><s%> the spear <S%H2595><s%> in sunder; he burneth <S%H8313><s%> the chariot <S%H5699><s%> in the fire. <S%H784><s%>

Be still, <S%H7503><s%> and know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H595><s%> am God: <S%H430><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> among the heathen, <S%H1471><s%> I will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in the earth. <S%H776><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> is with <S%H5973><s%> us; the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> is our refuge. <S%H4869><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
